response.answer_text: An easier question to answer is whether a teacher is considered to be a scientist by the scientific community. When scientists think about “scientists” they think about those who head a lab, Principal Investigators, with publishing track records. The term “Independent Investigator” is important. It means the individual was not just a pair of hands in a lab. So, what do we call a retired Principle Investigator who has devoted himself/herself to teaching, such as Walter White in “Breaking Bad.” I guess we call him/her a retired scientist. If a teacher has not had that background, he/she would not be considered a scientist by other scientists.

Generally not to be a scientist you have to come up with theories and create experiments to find out if it works or not. Chefs are scientist if they are coming up with new dishes. Business people are scientist if they are coming up with new businesses. Designers are if they are coming up with new products.

Only evolutionists are actual scientists because they accept the foundation of all science; this is why they are given degrees in schools, colleges , and Universities.
